title: 5.0.0rc2: error when creating a new text file using external storage
body:
i load a dropbox account and click into it.  in there i create a new folder, all works.  then i create a new text file.  it thinks for a minute and then fails.

oc 5.0.0rc2, running on opensuse 12.2 with mysql

logs from the server:
error 	files_external 	resource at uri: https://api.dropbox.com/1/metadata/dropbox/apps/what%20happens%20here.txt could not be found. path '/apps/what happens here.txt' not found 	march 6, 2013 09:40
debug 	core 	adding user backend instance of oc_user_database. 	march 6, 2013 09:40
